20110107233201.000|20110107233202.000|CC1|REAL ESTATE DEVELOPER.          
20110107233202.000|20110107233203.000|CC1|THE SHOTS WERE REPORTEDLY TAKEN

20110107233210.000|20110107233211.000|CC1|RANCHO MIRAGE, CALIFORNIA.      
20110107233211.000|20110107233213.000|CC1|THE ESTATE IS ON THE MARKET FOR 
20110107233213.000|20110107233214.000|CC1|$55 MILLION, REDUCED FROM THE   
20110107233214.000|20110107233216.000|CC1|ORIGINAL ASKING PRICE OF 75
